_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.11^where_before_or_ar: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.11^who_mentioned_befo: A nun who has been given the full ordination in unanimity by both Sanghas
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:1.11^who_present_before: Nuns from the group of six
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1:3.3^who_present_before_: The nuns from the group of six
pli-tv-bi-vb-np1^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
